author: cms-sw
body:
AlCa needs the new version of boost in 74x reverted I'm creating a PR by reverting David's original one - but could someone test and see how a CMSSW build goes - I don't see that we had fallout issues from this change, but maybe I've missed something.

Reverts cms-sw/cmsdist#1184
title: Revert "boost,boost-toolfile: update to 1.57.0"
